name: A2 Racer IV: De Politie slaat terug
summary:
Part four in the A2 Racer series includes tracks in Amsterdam, Scheveningen, Berlin, Hamburg and Vienna.

The gameplay of this game continues that of its predecessors with illegal street races on well known high ways and through major European cities.

During the race players will have to collect power-ups like fuel, money and time extensions, while avoiding the police and trying to finish first.

This fourth installment features the Havok Physics Engine for improved car physics, handling and collision.
